Jedna z najlepszych gier ,w które grałem (i gram nadal).Jest tak ,ponieważ posiada dobrą rozgrywkę ,która stawia na współpracę z innymi graczami ,oraz prosty system ekonomiczny (zabijasz mutanty i dostajesz pieniądze ,po zakończeniu fali idziesz do sklepu i je wydajesz (prostszy chyba nie może być)),system perków podzielony na 6 poziomów (każdy z  nich daje zniżkę na konkretny typ broni i specjalne statystyki),kilka typów mutantów + boss ,duży arsenał (od noża przez karabiny szturmowe ,strzelby itd. po miotacze ognistych kul i innego typu niekonwencjonalnych broni),Dosh,dobre DLC (skiny i broń),wiele różnorodnych map ,a do tego slowmotion działające w trybie solo i mult....Poprostu coś wspaniałego...

Would highly reccomend as one of my favorite games. The gameplay is challenging and rewarding and is especially fun with friends. Would recommend to pick up a few copies for you and your friends as it goes on sale frequently. Its an old game but it still holds up as one of my favorites.

По сюжету, смыслу, геймплею Killing Floor мало чем отличается от Left 4 Dead. Тут же похожая нераскрытая история по зомби на городских улицах и о группе выживших, этих самих зомби уничтожающих. Но все же, отличия есть, причем как те, что возносят Killing Floor выше конкурента, так и те, что низвергают игру к низам.

Очень достойная игра для любителей покрошить нечисть, под отличную музыку. Музыка в этой игре не просто отличная, а охрененная!
В этой игре есть огромное количество карт, которые можно докачать к стандартным, очень достойный выбор оружия на любой вкус, от обычного пистолета, заканчивая бензопилой или огнеметом, которыми можно крошить зомбаков на куски.
И самая главная жемчужина этой игры-это мультиплеер. Потому что если в одиночной игре, со временем, становится скучновато, то в мультиплерее с друзьями можно рубиться огромное количество часов, каждый раз создавая индивидуальную тактику, наиболее подходящую под ваши типы оружия и под различные карты.
И если вам нравится все вышеперечисленное, то я однозначно рекомендую вам купить ее!

Quando eu comprei esse jogo eu achava que esse jogo era uma copia piorada de Left 4 Dead, mas eu me enganei. O jogo tem sim algumas semelhanças, mas em sua maior parte é um jogo completamente diferente. 
O jogo pode enjoar um pouco de se jogar sozinho, mas como é um jogo co-op online de até 6 players, quanto mais amigos jogando, melhor. É muito divertido de se jogar com os amigos.
Uma coisa boa do jogo, é a dificuldade. Esse jogo é muito dificil, e por isso, fica mais legal de se jogar.
Pra mim, a pior parte é a dificuldade de se criar um server (tirando lan q é facil). Por isso, vc e seus amigos vão com certeza ter que entrar em um server já criado. Fora isso, o jogo é otimo, por isso eu recomendo.

Cant get enough of this since I bought it. This is one of the best co op shooters I've played in a long time.

The class system is very well laid out giving you the ability to choose between weapons type and the style of play you want. This is a kind of choice you don't get in these kinds of games which is nice to see. 
There are two game modes.  Killing Floor and Objective. Killing floor has one rule.. Survive. You are bombarded with waves of enemies where either yourself or up to six players have to stand your ground and defeat the end boss. Objective is pretty self explanatory. You are given different assignment to complete and survive the hoards of mutants at the same time.  Teamwork is paramount.

I would recommend this game to anyone, especially those that are looking for a fast paced FPS to play with there friends.
Ótimo fps. excelente precisão de disparos e gráficos muito bons das armas e monstros.

But other than all those guns, you also have alot of DLC which is pretty anoying.
On the other hand, I haven't been adicted to this game. Its fun to play with your friends, but other than that, meh.

So buy this if you want to play CO-OP with friends.

I would give it a 7.5/10

Killing Floor is at its best when playing with friends. I've always had fun exploring the community made maps looking for exploits or sometimes welding a door to a single entrance building while waiting for the horde to come crashing in. There's always a great feeling of achievement after completing a map on a difficulty you'd never tried before, getting the final kill against the Patriarch boss, speaking of which, there are just enough enemy types, the perfect amount to keep the gameplay almost tireless. The level design is excellent, the gameplay is solid and simple and the whole game has an atmosphere of an old-school arcade shooter- a great one at that- and on top of all this, the experience is expanded by community made content, mods and maps. I'd say the games only weak points are its graphics- at times, but highly neglible given the sheer amount in positives for the game-, the music wasn't to my taste and sometimes the testosterone levels in the final game are a little too over-the-top for me, but that's me.

My verdict, a great old-school arcade shooter, a fantastic experience when playing with friends and a tireless one with all the content that is available- I don't like review scores but I'll give it a solid 9 out of 10.
Хорошая игра

A fun game for people with or without friends! Don't expect this game to be easy (unless you play on the easiest difficulty), you'll be fighting for your life with all kinds of weaponry to your disposal! Whether it be a katana or a fire ball launching cannon, you'd better know what you're doing or else you'll be impaled, puked on, set on fire, and many more painful ways to die!

Happy hunting, nignogs.

The intense gameplay is where it's at.  Killing Floor is fun to play, but you might wanna invite friends towards a match due to the intense action and laborious, due to the mutants you fight in swarms and they send tougher ones at you at every round.    I recommand this to anyone who is into intense action, nasty mutents that scare the hell out of you and will obliterate in eight different ways, awesome heavy metal soundtrack for all you head bangers out there, and some great DLC so the fun never stops.  Can't wait till the sequel comes out.

-Workshop weapons/maps/characters (awesome)
-Fun to play with friends

Cons
-Ton of DLCs
-Not a good gore system
-Fu cking fleshpounder waves

8/10

Killing Floor is honestly one of the better games I've ever played as a multiplayer co-op game. I've played my shared of Left 4 Dead 2 and it's honestly a different experience. Killing Floor is a great mess of chaotic shooting and yelling and blood and everything you could want to kill four hours at a time. Make sure you get a bunch of friends though, it's the only way to have fun. The only con I can say is that if you're usually the server host, there's a bunch of ports you'll need to forward. Which isn't too bad, but I had to delete a bunch of old port forwards to make room for Killing Floor.

10/10 would bang anytime.
overall worth the money extremly fun and a good game to play with friends
